name: OmniGraffle
description: OmniGraffle is a diagramming and digital illustration application for macOS and iOS. It is used for creating precise, beautiful graphics such as website wireframes, electrical systems, family trees, and maps. OmniGraffle provides a range of tools for drawing shapes, connecting lines, and adding text, making it suitable for both technical and creative projects.

situations: want imagery to support a project

notes: Limited collaboration options with per-seat pricing.
